dcterms:creator: D. Byrd
M. Hybinette
T. H. Balch
dcterms:description: ABIDES is a detailed model designed to emulate market order dynamics, facilitating the simulation of tens of thousands of trading agents and various behavioral types of trading agents. It outputs emergent time series of bid-ask prices and order volumes, allowing for the calibration of agent configurations to match observed data.
dcterms:title: ABIDES
